root.name: Professor Layton and the Azran Legacy
root.description: OverviewProfessor Layton and the Azran Legacy was released in Japan on February 28, 2013, and will be released in Europe on November 8, 2013, North America in 2014, and Australia in late 2013. Azran Legacy, according to Level-5 CEO Akihiro Hino, is the final game in the series to feature Hershel Layton as the main character.
